g.text: Can you require â€˜Corporateâ€™ Ownership in Intune
which Conditional Access actions you have encountered per persona in the Excel tem
. Considering the security risk, determine which actions are needed and realistic to
implement. Some of the Conditional Access actions should operate on an opt
out principle. With that, the specific
Conditional access action is applied by de
ult to each persona in your environment, and they must be explicitly
excluded from that CA policy if they have a valid use case.

text.font-family: Avenir Next LT Pro,Avenir Next LT Pro_MSFontService,sans-serif
Avenir Next LT Pro,Avenir Next LT Pro_MSFontService,sans-serif

text.font-family: Avenir Next LT Pro,Avenir Next LT Pro_MSFontService,sans-serif

text.font-family: Avenir Next LT Pro,Avenir Next LT Pro_MSFontService,sans-serif
Avenir Next LT Pro,Avenir Next LT Pro_MSFontService,sans-serif

text.font-family: Avenir Next LT Pro,Avenir Next LT Pro_MSFontService,sans-serif
